episodes.title: Alleged ‘Zizian’ cult linked to four slayings in three states
episodes.description: Police link an alleged cult called the “Zizians” to the slaying of four people, including landowner Curtis Lind, parents Richard and Rita Zajko, and Border Patrol Agent David Maland. The arrest of Jack Lasota, the suspected cult leader, unveiled what investigators claim is a bi-coastal crime spree tied to the group. Ashleigh Banfield joins host Ana Garcia.
